answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Izzy – I hope the following is helpful:
Lawrence, KS – Solid Waste Performance
http://lawrenceks.org/auditor/2010/solid_waste_performance
Charlotte – indicators start on Page 11
http://charmeck.org/city/charlotte/Budget/Documents/Solid%20Waste%20Services.pdf
Clark, WA - Waste Monitoring and Performance Measurement
http://www.clark.wa.gov/recycle/documents/15%20Waste%20Monitoring%20and%20Measurement.pdf
Fairfax County – Measurers start on Page 4
http://www.fairfaxcounty.gov/dmb/fy2013/adopted/volume2/sr_ovswo.pdf
Phoenix – Solid Waste/Recycling 
http://phoenix.gov/webcms/groups/internet/@inter/@dept/@budget/documents/web_content/52summary2013.pdf
SOLID WASTE BEST PRACTICES IN THE Maricopa County REGION
http://www.azmag.gov/Documents/SWAC_2013-01-18_Solid-Waste-Best-Practices-in-the-MAG-Region-Dec-2012.pdf
San Antonio, TX – PPT for Council report re: Solid Waste Management Report
https://www.sanantonio.gov/Portals/0/Files/budget/FY2014/Work%20Sessions/2014%20Proposed%20Budget%20-%20SWMD%20final.pdf
Pamela Muse

author: Izzy Murguia
text:
Hello - 
I am seeking for sample performances measures/benchmarks for solid waste / recycling. I'd appreciate if you could share links to your municipal website or document tracking respective measures. Thank you.
title: Performance Measures/Benchmarks for Solid Waste
